DOC.brief_title: Bioavailability Study Sirolimus Tablets 2 mg Under Fasting Condition
DOC.detailed_description: Open label , randomize , two-treatment , two-period , two-sequence , cross , single dose , oral bioequivalence study Sirolimus tablets 2 mg Fasting condition .
